class_notes: (Permission of Instructor Required Prior to Enrollment)
course_description:
This is an entry-level lifeguard certification class. Upon completion of this class you may receive certifications in the following from the American Red Cross:
Lifeguarding, First Aid, CPR for the Professional Rescuer.
sections: Class Nbr: 3630, Section #: 1, Type: PE, Campus: OXF, Meets: Th 2:30-5:15p, Instructor: T. De Lapp, Status: Open
